channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Home Depot misses third-quarter earnings expectations, cuts outlook
item.description: Home Depot ‘s third-quarter was mixed with fewer violent storms reaching shore, more anxiety among U.S. consumers, and a housing market that is in a d...

item.title: Michelle Obama shares her styling hacks that make her confident and allow her to ‘do the work’
item.description: The attorney and former U.S. First Lady never follows trends, wears outfits that make her feel beautiful, and tailors all her clothes to make differen...

item.title: AI’s Recruiting Bias Is Probably Slipping by Your HR Team. Here’s How to Fix That
item.description: A study shows that AI training data can reinforce hiring prejudices, and humans don’t catch it often enough.

item.title: Billionaire tech founder Joe Liemandt says getting an MBA isn’t worth it and you don’t learn a ‘fraction’ of what you would as an entrepreneur
item.description: When asked by podcaster Codie Sanchez if people should get an MBA, Joe Liemandt promptly said “no.”

item.title: Larry Summers to step back from public commitments after Epstein emails
item.description: Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers said on Monday he will step back from all public commitments, days after President Donald Trump ordered t...

item.title: Why I Still Check Social Comments—and Other Founders Should, Too
item.description: Entrepreneurs can use the unfiltered voice of their customers to grow their brands.

item.title: Trump tells Americans the economy is better than ever at McDonald’s summit: ‘This is also the golden age’
item.description: The president said he wanted the term “affordability” to belong to Republicans, not Democrats amid growing economic anxiety.

item.title: Waymo is bringing fully autonomous driving to five more cities
item.description: Before Waymo was Waymo , it was Google’s self-driving car project . Starting in 2009, the effort spent many years in test mode—with humans in the driv...

item.title: Roblox to require age verification and age-based chats following lawsuits
item.description: Roblox is stepping up its age verification system for users who want to privately message other players and implementing age-based chats so kids, teen...

item.title: The 30 most bike-friendly cities in the world
item.description: Over the last decade, dozens of cities have reshaped streets around cycling and slower, safer, healthier travel. Take Paris: at rush hour, boulevards ...

item.title: Here’s What Daymond John Thinks of Alexis Ohanian’s ‘Shark Tank’ Guest Spot
item.description: Ohanian is no longer just ‘the Reddit guy.’

item.title: Google releases its heavily hyped Gemini 3 AI in a sweeping rollout—even Search gets it on day one
item.description: The widespread release of Gemini 3, including its fastest-ever deployment into Google Search, signals the company's ambition to dominate in AI.

item.title: Cloudflare Fixes Outage That Took Down ChatGPT, Reveals Cause
item.description: The platforms were among many affected by the widespread network outage, which Cloudflare says is resolved. Are hackers to blame?

item.title: Trump expected to treat Saudi crown prince as a full ally, with multibillion-dollar deals on F-35s and AI infrastructure
item.description: “They have been a great ally,” Trump said of the Saudis on the eve of the visit.
